it.polimi.se2018.model

Interface ToolCardEffect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToolCard, ToolCardEight, ToolCardEleven, ToolCardFive, ToolCardFour, ToolCardNine, ToolCardOne, ToolCardSeven, ToolCardSix, ToolCardTen, ToolCardThree, ToolCardTwelve, ToolCardTwo

    public interface ToolCardEffect

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean chooseNewDieValue()
      This effect permit the player to choose the value of the die get from the dice bag.
      void consumeEffect()
      Consume the effect of the card.
      boolean decreaseDieValue()
      This effect permit the player to decrease a drafted die by one.
      boolean flipDraftedDie()
      This effect permit the player to flip a drafted die.
      boolean increaseDieValue()
      This effect permit the player to increase a drafted die by one.
      boolean moveADie()
      This effect permit the player to move two times a placed die to another space of the window pattern.
      boolean moveDieIgnoreColor()
      This effect permit the player to move a placed die.
      boolean moveDieIgnoreValue()
      This effect permit the player to move a placed die.
      boolean moveTwoDiceMatchColorOnRoundTrack()
      This effect permit the player to move two dice that match the color of a die of the round track.
      boolean placeDieAfterFirstTurn()
      This effect permit the player to draft and place another die after the end of his own turn.
      boolean placeDraftedDieNoAdjacent()
      This effect permit the player to place a drafted die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die.
      boolean rerollAllDraftPoolDice()
      This effect permit the player to reroll all dice in the draft pool.
      boolean rerollDraftedDie()
      This effect permit the player to reroll the drafted die.
      boolean returnDieAndGetNewFromDiceBag()
      This effect permit the player to swap a drafted die with a die in the dice bag.
      boolean swapDraftDieWithRoundTrackDie()
      This effect permit the player to swap a die from the draft pool with a die from the round track.

    • Method Detail

      • increaseDieValue

        boolean increaseDieValue()
        This effect permit the player to increase a drafted die by one.
        Returns:
        true if a player can increase a drafted die by one.

      • decreaseDieValue

        boolean decreaseDieValue()
        This effect permit the player to decrease a drafted die by one.
        Returns:
        true if a player can decrease a drafted die by one.

      • moveDieIgnoreColor

        boolean moveDieIgnoreColor()
        This effect permit the player to move a placed die. The moved die can ignore color restrictions.
        Returns:
        true if a player can move a die to another space of the window pattern.

      • moveDieIgnoreValue

        boolean moveDieIgnoreValue()
        This effect permit the player to move a placed die. The moved die can ignore value restrictions.
        Returns:
        true if a player can move a die to another space of the window pattern.

      • moveADie

        boolean moveADie()
        This effect permit the player to move two times a placed die to another space of the window pattern.
        Returns:
        true if a player can move two die.

      • swapDraftDieWithRoundTrackDie

        boolean swapDraftDieWithRoundTrackDie()
        This effect permit the player to swap a die from the draft pool with a die from the round track.
        Returns:
        true if a player can swap the dice.

      • rerollDraftedDie

        boolean rerollDraftedDie()
        This effect permit the player to reroll the drafted die.
        Returns:
        true if a player can reroll a drafted die.

      • rerollAllDraftPoolDice

        boolean rerollAllDraftPoolDice()
        This effect permit the player to reroll all dice in the draft pool.
        Returns:
        true if a player can reroll all dice in the draft pool.

      • placeDieAfterFirstTurn

        boolean placeDieAfterFirstTurn()
        This effect permit the player to draft and place another die after the end of his own turn.
        Returns:
        true if a player can draft and place another die after the end of his own turn.

      • placeDraftedDieNoAdjacent

        boolean placeDraftedDieNoAdjacent()
        This effect permit the player to place a drafted die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die.
        Returns:
        true if a player can place a drafted die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die.

      • flipDraftedDie

        boolean flipDraftedDie()
        This effect permit the player to flip a drafted die.
        Returns:
        true if a player can flip a drafted die.

      • returnDieAndGetNewFromDiceBag

        boolean returnDieAndGetNewFromDiceBag()
        This effect permit the player to swap a drafted die with a die in the dice bag.
        Returns:
        true if a player can swap the dice.

      • chooseNewDieValue

        boolean chooseNewDieValue()
        This effect permit the player to choose the value of the die get from the dice bag.
        Returns:
        true if a player can choose the value of the die.

      • moveTwoDiceMatchColorOnRoundTrack

        boolean moveTwoDiceMatchColorOnRoundTrack()
        This effect permit the player to move two dice that match the color of a die of the round track.
        Returns:
        true if a player can move two dice.

      • consumeEffect

        void consumeEffect()
            throws ToolCardStateException
        Consume the effect of the card.
        Throws:
        ToolCardStateException
